word: The Lord gave men minds in order that He might control them. But Satan has come in with a determination to control the minds of men. . . . He has led men into . . . the use of the narcotic tobacco, of opium, and all other drugs which weaken the hold of the human family upon life.--Ms 5, 1889, p. 3. ("The Need for Consecrated Workers," typed January 26, 1899.)
